Articles.Content:
This a state of the art heavy lifting atmospheric drop-ship. has 10 low attitude jet engines that allow it to lift a whole orange tank with 2/3 thrust. Not to mention its lifting its own weight of 50 tones from 302 parts. when flying do not point the nose to low (recommend no further than 20 degrees). The cargo bay is large enough to carry medium sized payloads.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
